verses.name: Romans 11:28
verses.text: As concerning the gospel, they are enemies for your sakes: but as touching the election, they are beloved for the fathers’ sakes.

verses.name: Romans 11:29
verses.text: For the gifts and calling of God are without repentance.

verses.name: Romans 11:30
verses.text: For as ye in times past have not believed God, yet have now obtained mercy through their unbelief:

verses.name: Romans 11:31
verses.text: Even so have these also now not believed, that through your mercy they also may obtain mercy.

verses.name: Romans 11:32
verses.text: For God hath concluded them all in unbelief, that he might have mercy upon all.
